tags.name: items
tags.value: select sum( case when array_length(targeting_departure_exact, 1)=array_length(targeting_destination_exact, 1) then array_length(targeting_destination_exact, 1) else        coalesce(array_length(targeting_departure_exact, 1), 1) * coalesce(array_length(targeting_destination_exact, 1), 1) end )  from uluru.legacy_offer;
